page.title: 02CUSTOMS IN THE OTLEY AREA
page.content: }CHRISTIAN AID WALK-Every year the churches and schools in Otley District take part in a walk over Otley Chevin. The walk is for Christian Aid.Normally 500 people take part.The event raises over Â£1500 for this charity. OTLEY SHOW-Another annual event is Otley Show,which takes place at the end of May.It is an agricultural show, but there are side shows and stalls. BEST KEPT VILLAGE-Burley-in-Wharfedale takes part in the best kept village competition.In 1979 Burley won. EASTER CROSS-Every Easter,a cross is put on the Chevin.For three weeks the 20m cross can be seen from the valley and on Easter Sunday it is the site for a special service.
